Title: Viotek - GFI34CB 34" IPS LED Ultrawide Monitor (HDMI, DisplayPort)
Description: The VIOTEK GFI34CB 34-inch ultrawide monitor provides the best multi-tasking experience around. It pushes 16.7 million displayable colors at a 99% sRGB color gamut (90% NTSC, 83% Adobe RGB) and 1M:1 DCR.  So black colors are deep, whites are vibrant, and the RGBs are rich and gorgeous.  It’s a great option for photographers, designers, and other content creators that demand accurate colors on a large, ultrawide display. And what about playtime?  Movies and games look as crisp and vibrant as the creators intended them, bursting with pops of color and high contrast shadows-- all with ultra-sharp detail and 2560x1440p resolution.  Customize the display using 6 presets (standard, text, FPS, movie, game, RTS) with options to fine-tune the colors even more.  Need sharper text for spreadsheet work? Want a warmer color for all-day movie binges? You got it. Dominate the leaderboards with a monitor designed for game-changing, pixel-perfect precision. Adaptive Sync eliminates jitters and distracting visual glitches that pull you out of the game.  It’s compatible with AMD FreeSync LFC and NVIDIA G-SYNC. The VIOTEK Gaming Suite delivers gameplay enhancements for players of all skill levels.  GAMEPLUS adds OSD targeting crosshairs for improved aim in FPS games that have crosshairs disabled.  FPS/RTS optimization adds detail to darker colors, making it harder for snipers to hide in the shadows and get the drop on you. Take advantage of the high-powered ports and connect a wide variety of devices to the monitor, from laptops and game consoles to home theater systems.  Ports include: DP 1.2, 2x HDMI 2.0 and a 3.5mm audio out/headphone jack. The GFI34CB is protected by a three-year limited warranty, backed by a U.S. company.  It also includes our best-in-market zero-tolerance dead pixel policy.  Most other companies require a cluster of 3-5 dead pixels.  Not VIOTEK!  We’re so sure of every monitor’s quality that if you see a single dead pixel, we’ll give you a replacement.  Have any questions?  Simply reach out to our customer support staff, available via e-mail, phone, or live chat.  We’re ready to help.

Title: Viotek - GFT27CXB2 27" LED Full-HD FreeSync & G-Sync Compatible Gaming Monitor (HDMI, DisplayPort)
Description: Unleash the full power of your PC!  The VIOTEK GFTCXB2 monitor lets you experience every detail, displayed with laser-sharp focus and every movement delivered with crystal clarity.  We start with the TN panel, expertly engineered for flicker-free video and rapid-fire response time.  The 240hz refresh rate and 1ms GtG response decimates lag and motion blur in shooters, racers, strategy, and sports games.  The ultrafast refresh rate lets you react instantly to what's on-screen for the smoothest, most fluid experience you’ve ever seen. “But it’s a TN panel?”  Yes, we get it: VA panels are always better for image quality.  But our engineers optimized the TN panels’ liquid crystal components to make that “ALMOST always.”  We’ve designed the GFTCXB2 to have the vivid color-richness you expect from VA technology while keeping TN’s refresh rate advantage.  The GFTCXB2 sports a 99% sRGB color gamut, one-million-to-one contrast ratio, and 400 cd/m2 brightness for life-like images with dependable color accuracy. Shadows are deep; whites are brilliant; and RGBs are lush and full of epic detail. This makes your games pop with energy — and does the same with your favorite movies or TV shows.  Activate AMD FreeSync with LFC (low-framerate compensation) to enjoy smooth gameplay without stuttering, tearing, or ghosting during motion-heavy games.  (It’s also compatible with NVIDIA G-SYNC.)  We include the Viotek Gaming Suite with FPS/RTS optimizations for even more detail in darker images: see snipers hiding in shadows before they get the drop on you.  Fully adjustable, the color calibration options let you tweak the color balance to your exact preference.  Add on-screen GAMEPLUS crosshairs to any game, making you even more deadly.  And glare protection and a blue-light filter minimizes eyestrain so you can play or watch all day and night. Connectivity?  We’ve got it.  Plug in your PC, PS5, and Xbox One without having to swap cables.  The VIOTEK GFTCXB2 has HDMI 2.0, HDMI 1.4, and DP 1.2 ports that support almost any desktop, laptop, console, cable box, or Blu-Ray player.  There’s also a 3.5mm audio out port that blasts sound to your home stereo, soundbar, or headphones for an even more immersive experience. The ergonomic stand provides tilt and swivel so you can easily find your ideal viewing position. The display is also VESA-compatible for wall mounting. Backed by a three year warranty, VIOTEK is so sure of every monitor’s quality that we’ll send you a replacement if you see even a single dead pixel. Any questions? Simply reach out to our customer support staff, available via e-mail, phone or live chat. We’re ready to help.

Title: Viotek - REAPER RFI25CBA 25" IPS LED FHD 1MS Gaming Monitor - Black

The RFI25CBA offers Adaptive Sync* that further reduces image glitches, tears and ghosting on fast-paced games while still maximizing refresh rates on compatible devices—including Xbox One. So your high-octane games are liquid-smooth with minimal distortion. (Adaptive Sync works with G-SYNC and FreeSync.) The OSD provides presets for quick, on-the-fly image adjustments (standard, photo, movie, game, FPS, RTS, sRGB). But you can also fine-tune image settings to your liking. Adjust the image gamma, hue and saturation based on the movie you’re watching or the game you’re playing. Ramp up the detail in darker, shadow-heavy games (horror, FPS) with FPS optimization and get the drop on enemy snipers before they get the drop on you. Dynamic Luminous Control auto adjusts the brightness levels based on what’s being displayed. The result is crisp images that never get too dark. Connected devices with lower resolution are auto-upscaled, ideal when connecting smartphones or tablets. The RFI25CBA’s connection flexibility lets you use the monitor with a variety of devices, including gaming consoles, such Xbox, Switch and PS4/5, and even smartphones and other mobile devices. Extend and expand the viewing space of your mobile device by using the RFI25CBA as its monitor when you connect them via a video-ready USB-C cord. (Mobile device must be compatible with DP ALT MODE.) Increase your productivity and multitask like a boss with PIP/PBP, perfect for content creators and game streamers. The slim 3-sided bezel lets you see more content and less frame. Turn on the red LED backlight and get in the mood to conquer the leaderboards. Adjust the RFI25CBA for optimal positioning with the innovative 4D stand. Tilt, raise, swivel or pivot the monitor to your liking. Go from landscape mode to portrait mode and back again. Use the built-in cable management to keep your chords under control and your workstation tidy. The RFI25CBA is also VESA-ready for mounting or using articulating VESA-ready monitor stands.
